Calculate weights for Point Process models

Source: R/utils-gdb.R
ppm_weights.Rd

Calculate weights for Point Process models

ppm_weights(df, pa, bg, weight = 1e-04)

Arguments

df

The data.frame for which weights are to be calculated
bg

A background raster layer
weight

A numeric with the base weight. Default to 1e-6
presence

A vector with the observed species. Has to be in range 0 to Inf

Value

A vector with the weights

References

Renner, I.W., Elith, J., Baddeley, A., Fithian, W., Hastie, T., Phillips, S.J., Popovic, G. and Warton, D.I., 2015. Point process models for presence‐only analysis. Methods in Ecology and Evolution, 6(4), pp.366-379.
